programme.title: The Man with the Answers
programme.desc: A former diving champion and an eccentric student take an adventurous road trip of rediscovery. Romantic drama, starring Vasilis Magouliotis, Anton Weil and Stella Fyrogeni. In Greek, Italian, German and English.(n)

programme.title: Steve Jobs
programme.desc: Danny Boyle's biopic of the technology entrepreneur, exploring his life through three pivotal moments over the course of 14 years. Jobs is passionately driven to revolutionise computing technology, but his dreams come at a price, with a devastating impact on both is relationship with his family and his own health. Starring Michael Fassbender, Kate Winslet and Seth Rogen.(n)

programme.title: Ferrari
programme.desc: During the summer of 1957, ex-racecar driver Enzo Ferrari is in crisis. Bankruptcy stalks the company he and his wife, Laura, built from nothing a decade earlier. Their tempestuous marriage struggles with the mourning for one son and the acknowledgement of another. Attempting to secure their survival, he rolls the dice on one race - 1,000 miles across Italy, the iconic Mille Miglia. Director Michael Mann's drama, starring Adam Driver and Jack O'Connell.(n)

programme.title: 8 Mile
programme.desc: A white rapper strives to make a name for himself on the music scene, but his deprived home life on a Detroit trailer park and romantic complications put a damper on his plans as he struggles to win over the crowds and earn the respect of his peers. Drama, starring Eminem, Kim Basinger, Mekhi Phifer and Brittany Murphy.(n)

programme.title: Bob Marley: One Love
programme.desc: In 1976, Jamaica is dangerously divided across political lines and musician Bob Marley vows to quell the violence by performing at the Smile Jamaica Concert. Two days before the high-profile gig, gunmen break into the singer's home, shooting Bob, his wife Rita and manager Don Taylor. Everyone survives and Marley moves to London with his entourage to begin work on the LP Exodus under Island Records supremo Chris Blackwell. Biographical drama, starring Kingsley Ben-Adir, Lashana Lynch and James Norton.(n)

programme.title: Sundown
programme.desc: Neil and Alice Bennett are the core of a wealthy family on holiday in Mexico, until a distant emergency cuts their trip short. When one relative disrupts the family's tight-knit order, simmering tensions rise to the fore. Drama, starring Tim Roth, Albertine Kotting McMillan and Samuel Bottomley.(n)

programme.title: Steve Jobs

programme.title: Black Dog
programme.desc: Two teenage boys from different London backgrounds embark on a road trip North together. As they open up about their pasts, the lads learn they have more in common than they thought. Drama co-written by and starring Jamie Flatters, with Keenan Munn-Francis, Nicholas Pinnock and Paul Kaye.(n)

programme.title: Rob Peace
programme.desc: A young man is torn between his father's shadowed past and his own promising future. Raised by his devoted mother, Rob Peace risks everything he has worked for to free his imprisoned dad. Drama, starring Chiwetel Ejiofor, who also adapted Jeff Hobbs' book and directed, with Jay Will, Camila Cabello and Mary J Blige.(n)

programme.title: Harold and the Purple Crayon
programme.desc: Harold and pals Moose and Porcupine live in a hand-drawn world of limitless possibilities. The trio become concerned when the Old Man, who narrates their illustrated existence, suddenly falls silent. Using his magical crayon, Harold draws a door to the real world and tumbles into the present day as a flesh-and-blood man, who collides head-on with widow Terry and her young son, Mel. Family adventure, starring Zachary Levi, Lil Rel Howery, Zooey Deschanel and Benjamin Bottani.(n)

programme.title: The Good Half
programme.desc: Returning home for his mother's funeral, Renn Wheeland forges new relationships and heals old ones as he faces his grief. Drama, starring Nick Jonas, David Arquette and Brittany Snow.(n)

programme.title: Blood For Dust
programme.desc: A travelling salesman drowning under the weight of providing for his family finds himself on a dangerous path after a chance encounter with a colleague. Action thriller, starring Scoot McNairy, Kit Harington, Josh Lucas and Ethan Suplee.(n)

programme.desc: A psychologist investigates a local cult, but as his daughter enters their mysterious world, he must race to save her. Sky Original thriller with Eric Bana and Sadie Sink.

programme.title: Mona Lisa and The Blood Moon
programme.desc: A girl with unusual powers escapes from a mental asylum and tries to make it on her own in New Orleans. Sky Original horror comedy with Kate Hudson and Craig Robinson.

programme.desc: Sky original offering a thrilling update to Dickens's classic tale, as a gang of street hustlers plan the heist of the century. With Michael Caine, Rita Ora and Lena Headey.

programme.desc: Cat Maurice comes up with a money-making scam when he meets a group of talking rats. Star-studded Sky Original animation with the voices of Hugh Laurie and Emilia Clarke.

programme.title: Paws of Fury: The Legend of Hank
programme.desc: Loveable dog Hank sets out to become a samurai. Sky Original family film based on Mel Brooks' Blazing Saddles, with the voices of Michael Cera and Samuel L Jackson.

programme.title: Blithe Spirit
programme.desc: When a writer visits a medium for help with a creative block, they unwittingly summon the spirit of his dead first wife and a love triangle unfolds with his current spouse.

programme.title: The Independent
programme.desc: A young journalist discovers a conspiracy involving a US Presidential candidate that could change the election. Sky Original thriller starring Jodie Turner-Smith.

programme.desc: Discover Lee Miller, the war photographer who heroically documented the truth of the Nazi regime. Sky Original film with Kate Winslet.

programme.desc: In this Oscar and BAFTA-winning thriller with Carey Mulligan, a woman pursues her own form of justice after her friend is sexually assaulted.

programme.title: Ferrari
programme.desc: Ex-Formula 1 racer Enzo Ferrari launches his team into the perilous 1,000-mile Mille Miglia race. Sky Original film from Michael Mann with Adam Driver and PenÃ©lope Cruz.

programme.desc: In this action-packed thriller, former CIA operative Steve Vail is lured out of retirement to confront a rogue assassin blackmailing the agency.

programme.title: Daddio
programme.desc: During a taxi ride home, a young woman and her driver speak openly about relationships, power dynamics and loss. Sky Original film with Dakota Johnson and Sean Penn.

programme.desc: A young Nigerian woman seeking asylum in Ireland forms a tender friendship with an employee at her residence. Sky Original film starring Letitia Wright and Josh O'Connor.

programme.desc: The once booming Yellowstone City has fallen on hard times, but when a local prospector strikes gold, things start to look up - until he's found dead. Sky Original Western.

programme.title: Justice League
programme.desc: Fantasy action adventure starring Gal Gadot and Ben Affleck. With an ancient demonic threat looming, Bruce Wayne, aka Batman, enlists the help of Diana Prince (Wonder Woman) to form a new superhero team. After adding Aquaman, Cyborg and The Flash to its ranks, the league faces its first challenge: resurrecting Superman.

programme.title: Fast X
programme.desc: Vengeful son Dante Reyes vows to make Dominic Toretto's crew pay for their daredevil actions years ago in Rio de Janeiro. He ruthlessly targets the street racer Letty, Mia, Roman, Tej, hacker Ramsey and drift racer Han Lue. Meanwhile, scheming cyberterrorist Cypher continues to wreak havoc. Action sequel, starring Vin Diesel and Jason Momoa.

programme.title: The Bikeriders
programme.desc: Truck driver Johnny is inspired to establish the Vandals motorcycle club in 1960s Chicago. He assembles a motley crew, including Brucie, Benny, Cal and Zipco. Exuberant outsider Kathy falls under Benny's spell, and they marry, but when the groom is the victim of a violent assault, Johnny exacts revenge, while Kathy fights for her husband's tormented soul. Drama, starring Tom Hardy, Jodie Comer and

programme.title: Pixels
programme.desc: Sci-fi action comedy starring Adam Sandler and Kevin James. When aliens read signals from 1980s arcade games as a hostile message, it falls to Sam Brenner and his geeky gaming friends to save the world.

programme.title: Moving On
programme.desc: Comedy drama starring Jane Fonda and Lily Tomlin. At the funeral for an old friend, Claire approaches the deceased's widower and states that she intends to murder him in revenge for something terrible he did decades ago. Claire then reconnects with her estranged college pal, Evelyn, who agrees to help out - if only to see if Claire really follows through...

programme.title: Some Other Woman
programme.desc: While visiting an island for her husband's work, a woman meets a stranger who takes over her life. Thriller, starring Ashley Greene, Brooke Lyons and Tom Felton. Directed by Joel David Moore, better known as one of the stars of the Avatar films.

programme.title: Zombie Town
programme.desc: When teenagers Amy and Mike uncover an ancient curse after watching a film reel, they must track down a filmmaker and navigate a town of hungry zombies before it's too late to break the evil spell. Comedy horror based on the work of RL Stine, starring Dan Aykroyd, Chevy Chase and Madi Monroe.

programme.title: Pixels
programme.desc: Sci-fi action comedy starring Adam Sandler and Kevin James. When aliens read signals from 1980s arcade games as a hostile message, it falls to Sam Brenner and his geeky gaming friends to save the world.

programme.title: Wonder Woman
programme.desc: Fantasy action adventure starring Gal Gadot and Chris Pine. Young Diana has been raised a warrior on the secret island of Themyscira, shielded from the perils of the real world. When she rescues an American pilot whose plane crashes off the coast, Diana learns about the horrors of the First World War, and leaves the island with him to fight for peace and justice.

programme.title: Justice League
programme.desc: Fantasy action adventure starring Gal Gadot and Ben Affleck. Action sequel, starring Vin Diesel and Jason Momoa.

programme.title: Catch Me If You Can
programme.desc: Comedy drama, based on the true story of conman Frank Abagnale Jr, starring Leonardo DiCaprio and Tom Hanks. Shattered by the news that his parents are divorcing, 16-year-old Frank runs away to New York. For six years he lives a life of fraud, cashing over $2 million in bad cheques while impersonating an airline pilot, a paediatrician and a lawyer, and always staying one step ahead of tenacious FB

programme.title: It
programme.desc: Horror starring Jaeden Lieberher, Bill SkarsgÃ¥rd and Finn Wolfhard. In the summer of 1989, seven misfit children come together to investigate a series of mysterious tragedies in their town, and find themselves facing off against a demon that takes the shape of a terrifying clown.

programme.title: Cult Killer
programme.desc: After a private investigator is murdered, his protÃ©gÃ© discovers the grisly secrets of their town. Difrector Jon Keeyes' thriller, starring Antonio Banderas, Alice Eve and Shelley Hennig.

programme.title: Coup!
programme.desc: Satirical period comedy starring Peter Sarsgaard, Billy Magnussen and Sarah Gadon. In 1918, as the flu pandemic rages, the mysterious Floyd Monk arrives at the isolated estate of the Horton family, claiming to be their new chef. However, the man of the house - an ambitious journalist - soon grows suspicious of his new employee, who seems to be planting subversive ideas among his staff and charming

programme.title: One Day as a Lion
programme.desc: Jackie Powers will stop at nothing to prevent his son from following him into a life of crime. With his mob employer in pursuit, an encounter at a roadside diner charts a new path. Action thriller, starring Scott Caan, who also wrote the screenplay, JK Simmons and Frank Grillo.

programme.title: Zombie Town
programme.desc: When teenagers Amy and Mike uncover an ancient curse after watching a film reel, they must track down a filmmaker and navigate a town of hungry zombies before it's too late to break the evil spell. Comedy horror based on the work of RL Stine, starring Dan Aykroyd, Chevy Chase and Madi Monroe.

programme.title: The Secret Kingdom
programme.desc: Peter and his younger sister Verity move into a new house and struggle to acclimatise to their surroundings in an emotionally unsettling period for their family. The children tumble into a cavernous space beneath their bedroom and are greeted by an army of pangolins, who decree Peter their ruler. Fantasy adventure, starring Sam Everingham and Alyla Browne.

programme.title: The Invention of Lying
programme.desc: Comedy co-written, co-directed by and starring Ricky Gervais, and also starring Jennifer Garner. In a world where everyone is 100 per cent honest, Mark Bellison's brief moment of being economical with the truth turns him into something of a prophet. But will Mark's newfound celebrity status be enough to win the girl of his dreams?

programme.title: The Three Musketeers: Milady

Meanwhile, Porthos, Aramis and Athos are on their own mission...

programme.title: Catch Me If You Can

For six years he lives a life of fraud, cashing over $2 million in bad cheques while impersonating an airline pilot, a paediatrician and a lawyer, and always staying one step ahead of tenacious FB

programme.desc: Cat is a solitary animal, but as its home is devastated by a great flood, he finds refuge on a boat populated by various species, and will have to team up with them despite their differences.

programme.title: My Brilliant Friend
programme.desc: As fourth grade draws to an end, Elena and Lila fight with their families for the chance to continue their education; a trip out of town becomes a day Elena will never forget; a death changes things in the neighborhood forever.

programme.title: My Brilliant Friend
programme.desc: Elena grapples with the onset of puberty, her studies and her friendship with Lila, who now works in her family's shoe-repair store; as the girls' encounters with the opposite sex become more frequent, Lila takes a stand against the Solara brothers.

programme.title: My Brilliant Friend

programme.title: My Brilliant Friend
programme.desc: Elena grows tired of Gino, while Lila rejects two potential suitors at a cost; a rare outing into the city turns violent; Elena worries about not being there for Lila after accepting an invitation to spend the summer away from the neighborhood.

programme.title: My Brilliant Friend

programme.title: My Brilliant Friend
programme.desc: Elena returns to Naples to find Lila has made a romantic connection with Stefano, despite the looming presence of Marcello.
